ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Autoritatea Naţională pentru Administrare şi Reglementare în Comunicaţii

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Autoritatea Naţională pentru Administrare şi Reglementare în Comunicaţii

TITLE.P: Contract for services of coffee break and refreshments, hereinafter called catering services, offered to the VIP and VVIP participants in the VIP and VVIP lounges at the Palace of Parliament

SHORT_DESCR.P: Contract for coffee break and refreshments services, hereinafter called catering services, offered to the VIP and VVIP participants in the VIP and VVIP lounges at the Palace of Parliament, in the frame of the Plenipotentiary Conference of the International Telecommunication Union to take place in Bucharest, between 26 September and 14 October 2022, for maximum 218 persons/day for 19 days (CPV code: 55520000-1), in accordance with the minimum mandatory requirements provided in Section 2: Terms of Reference.

The provision of services of coffee break and refreshments, hereinafter called catering services, offered to the VIP and VVIP participants in the VIP and VVIP lounges at the Palace of Parliament, in the frame of the Plenipotentiary Conference of the International Telecommunication Union to take place in Bucharest, between 26 September and 14 October 2022, for maximum 218 persons/day for 19 days (CPV code: 55520000-1), in accordance with the minimum mandatory requirements provided in Section 2: Terms of Reference. The catering services will consist in ensuring the preparation, delivery and serving, in keeping with the needs of the Contracting Authority, throughout the days in which the Plenipotentiary Conference of the International Telecommunication Union is taking place, an event to be hosted in Bucharest, during 26 September-14 October 2022, 12h/day.

The awarding documentation related to the aforementioned services is available on the ANCOM website, www.ancom.ro, Section Announcements/Auction announces (Documentatie_atribuire_servicii_catering_PP22 (1).pdf) and on SEAP (www.e-licitatie.ro, Section Documents/Advertisement Notices -Advertising notice list – notice no. ADV1295918).

RULES_CRITERIA.P: The participation criteria are described in the awarding documentation which is available on the ANCOM website, www.ancom.ro, Section Announcements/Auction announces (Documentatie_atribuire_servicii_catering_PP22 (1).pdf) and on SEAP (www.e-licitatie.ro, Section Documents/Advertisement Notices -Advertising notice list– notice no. ADV1295918).

PERFORMANCE_CONDITIONS.P: The tenderer has to prove the capacity of performance and expertise by including in the offer a portfolio comprising maximum 3 similar prior projects conducted in Romania or abroad in the last 5 years, indicating the values, data and the public or private beneficiaries, with the cumulated value amounting to minimum 700,000.00 lei without VAT. By a similar project it is understood a project whose object was the provision of catering services to events similar to the one subject covered by the current procedure: meetings, conferences, congresses, exhibitions, fairs, events etc.

Fulfilment: the modality is detailed in the awarding documentation which is available on the ANCOM website, www.ancom.ro, Section Announcements/Auction announces (Documentatie_atribuire_servicii_catering_PP22 (1).pdf) and on SEAP (www.e-licitatie.ro, Section Documents/Advertisement Notices -Advertising notice list – notice no. ADV1295918).

MAIN_FEATURES_AWARD.P: Online/at a distance by using the electronic communications means (e-mail, videoconference via Microsoft Teams or Zoom). The current public procurement is held in accordance with the OPERATIONAL PROCEDURE – PROCUREMENT OF SOCIAL SERVICES FOR THE ORGANISATION OF EVENTS IN THE FRAME OF THE PLENIPOTENTIARY CONFERENCE OF THE INTERNATIONAL TELECOMMUNICATION UNION (PO-OEPP22), which is a procedure of the contracting authority in accordance with the provisions of art. 111 paragraph (1) of Law no. 98/2

INFO_ADD.P: A. The contracting authority has the obligation to request the tenderers to extend the validity of their offer, under exceptional circumstances which impose such an extension, before the expiry of the offer validity period. Where the offer validity is extended, the participation bond will be extended correspondingly. The tenderer has the obligation to communicate to the contracting authority if it agrees or not to the extension. The offer of the economic operator that refuses to extend the validity of its offer and of the participation bond will be considered unacceptable.

B. Number of days in which clarifications can be requested before the deadline set for submitting offers: 10. The contracting authority will respond clearly and comprehensively to all the requests of clarifications: on the 5th day before the deadline set in the notice for the submission of offers.

C. Additional information on determining the winning offer according to point II.2.5. Awarding criterion: best quality-price ratio, according to art. 187 paragraph (3) letter b) of Law no. 98/2016 on public procurements. The offer declared winner is the one that receives the highest score. Where there are two or several offers ranked first, with equal scores, the tiebreaker will be the score obtained at the assessment factors by decreasing order of their shares. Where the tie maintains, the contracting authority will request new financial proposals and the winning offer will be designated the one with the lowest financial proposal.
D. Communication of the result of the procedure

1. The result of the procedure (the report on the award procedure) will be submitted to the ANCOM management, for approval. The tenderers will be sent, in writing, a communication on the result of the procedure.
2. The communications sent to the tenderers will contain, as applicable, the invitation to sign the services contract or the reasons which grounded the refusal of their respective offers.

E. Specifications on the participation bond: its amount is 8,000 lei and its validity period is at least 130 days from the deadline set for the submission of offers. All the requirements under point III.1.6.a) Participation bond of this section will be observed.
F. All the requirements under point IV.4.1. Elaboration of the technical proposal of this section will be observed in the elaboration of the technical proposal.
G. All the requirements under point IV.4.2. Elaboration of the financial proposal of this section will be observed in the elaboration of the financial proposal.
H. All the requirements under point IV.4.3. Elaboration of the offer of this section will be observed in the elaboration of the offer.

I. Where, regardless of the reasons, the location of the Plenipotentiary Conference of the International Telecommunication Union is canceled/postponed/changed, ANCOM reserves the right to cancel the present procurement, the signing of the services contract being impossible.

As well, for reasons relating to the organization of the Plenipotentiary Conference of the International Telecommunication Union, ANCOM has the right to postpone the conclusion of the services contract, while the tenderers have the obligation to maintain valid and unchanged the offer they submitted, until the services contract is signed.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: National Council for Dispute Settlement or Bucharest Court

ADDRESS_MEDIATION_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: National Council for Dispute Settlement or Bucharest Court

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: Challenge filed at National Council for Dispute Settlement or Bucharest Court – within 10 days according to art. 8 paragraph (1) letter a) or art. 49 of Law no. 101/2016.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Public Procurement and Contracts Department/Legal Procurement Unit
